jobDescription: Job Title: Data AnalystLocation:Wee Hawken, NJ- 07086Duration: 4-6 months potential to full time position.Job Description: A degree in an analytical field such as engineering, mathematics, accounting, finance, economics, or information technology  A solid understanding of the wealth management and/or banking industry  5+ years of data analysis experience  Experience with project management  Highly skilled in Microsoft Access and Excel, with experience creating complex forms and reports in Microsoft Access  Working knowledge of Structured Query Language (SQL) is preferred Job Duties: Capable of amassing data and information from multiple sources and consolidating into a comprehensive data warehouse for intuitive use by business partners  Able to synthesize multiple data points and sources to define and implement key reporting for internal and external stakeholders  Willing to work long hours when necessary and consistently contribute to the forward growth of the business by "thinking out of the box"  Excited to contribute to a new business line within ##### Wealth Management with aggressive growth targets  Able to manage multiple, concurrent projects as ad-hoc requests are needed for senior management
